title: Make Yourself at Home
description:
Cyndi Freeman, Jeff Simmermon, and Christina Chiu share stories about very bad days, a cat-calling college boy, and a house divided.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (David Carbonara, Cyndi Freeman, Jeff Simmermon, The Allman Brothers Band, Esbjorn Svensson Trio, Christina Chiu, MILCK, Jeff Barr, Kevin Allison)
